description.value:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell.

You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you're wielding. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra 1d6 damage of a type depending on the school of the spell you just cast.

  • Abjuration @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force)]{force damage},
  • Conjuration or Transmutation @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Bespell Weapon]{the same type as the weapon},
  • Divination, Enchantment, or Illusion @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental)]{mental damage},
  • Evocation a type the spell dealt, or @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force)]{force damage} if the spell didn't deal damage,
  • Necromancy @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative)]{negative damage}
